TopicTitle: When zooming out orbits separate from Kerbin

Articles.Content: In these first two images you can see that the orbits are different from the location of kerbin as in they look like they are orbiting nothing. It does this only in the tracking station and not when looking at the map through a vessel. The next two are the mods that I am using. I am just looking for an answer. Thanks!
I've moved this into technical support for modded installs. I would also like to point out that there are no visible pictures in your post.
If you right click on the image link it will ask if you want to open it in another tab. That is where the image is.
That looks like its probably the notorious windowed-mode, resolution bug... It actually affects Windows, OSX, & Linux
Ok so how do I fix it?
